content:
fitzgen opened issue #8626:

(When using Cranelift.)

When I originally implemented wasmtime explore we didn't have a good way to get the CLIF. But since then we've added the --emit-clif CLI flag, so I suspect it is easier to get now than it was then. Would be very cool to have three panes, and the color-coded mapping between them synchronized: (1) wasm (2) clif (3) asm

vulc41n commented on issue #8626:

I did it on my fork, should I submit a pull request ? :smile:

kritzcreek commented on issue #8626:

Looks like the linked PR implemented this successfully (I just tried it), so I think you could close this issue.

alexcrichton closed issue #8626:

(When using Cranelift.)

When I originally implemented wasmtime explore we didn't have a good way to get the CLIF. But since then we've added the --emit-clif CLI flag, so I suspect it is easier to get now than it was then. Would be very cool to have three panes, and the color-coded mapping between them synchronized: (1) wasm (2) clif (3) asm

alexcrichton commented on issue #8626:

:+1:
